videoDetails.Title: Snake game in a graphing calculator! Desmos programming
videoDetails.Description:
Using programming languages for building games is for normies. Real programmers build games in graphing calculators. This is the twitch vod of my building a snake game clone on desmos - graphing calculator.

Snake game is the very popular video game where a snake has to survive on food that spawns in randomly but inevitably, the snake gets swallowed by his own greed... and his mouth... he eats himself... and that's where the game ends. This deep a narrative for a video game has never been seen since. The plot development of this classic video game is being studied in schools now.

Built live on https://twitch.tv/ediblemonad
Final result: https://www.desmos.com/calculator/dovgn2eany
Like my shitty tweets on twitter: https://twitter.com/ediblemonad

#programming #desmos #gaming #softwaredevelopment #maths
